statements: DELETE FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND protocol = 'TCP';
DELETE FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE rule_id = 1 AND source_ip = '192.168.1.10';
DELETE FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP' AND action = 'ALLOW';
DELETE FROM firewall_rules WHERE rule_id = 101 AND source_ip = '192.168.1.10';
DELETE FROM firewall_rules_mapping WHERE rule_id = 1 AND group_id = 2;
DELETE FROM rule_logs WHERE rule_id = 10 AND EXTRACT(DOW FROM log_time) = 5;
